# EX2

## Odhad parametru $\mu$ pro zafixovan√© $\sigma$

$\sigma$=2

### Momentova metoda

$E[X] = e^{\mu + \frac{\sigma^{2}}{2}} = \overline{Xn}$

$e^{\mu + \frac{2^{2}}{2}} = \overline{Xn}$

$e^{\mu + \frac{4}{2}} = \overline{Xn}$

$e^{\mu + {2}} = \overline{Xn}$

$\mu + {2} = \log{Xn}$

$\mu = \log{Xn} - 2$


```{r}
x = dlnorm(1000,1,2)
x_mean = mean(x)
odhad_mu = log(x_mean) - 2
odhad_mu
```


```{r}
odhady = c(rep(0,1000))
for (i in 1:1000) {
  x = dlnorm(1000,1,2)
  x_mean= mean(x)
  odhad_mu = log(x_mean) - 2
  odhady[i] = odhad_mu
}
mean(odhady)
hist(odhady)
```
